content: Here’s a shot in the dark which may or may not relate (disclaimer, I don’t know what I’m talking about but, who knows, it may prove of interest)… Chirps, a Dream I’m at this party, though I don’t actually see anyone or anything besides a Tiki bar. On the bar is a book which a guest left for me to read. It’s a huge fucking book, hardback, must be a thousand pages, I mean, this is another War and Peace we have here sitting on this otherwise deserted Tiki bar. I look at the title… Chirps. So, I’m about to leave the empty Tiki bar and a voice says, “Don’t forget your book.” I reply, “Yeah, yeah, I’ll remember.” Like you, Stephen, I’ve watched almost scifi movie I could get my hands on. Arrival is on my list. Have you seen Colossus: the Forbin Project? A low budget wonder with intriguing ideas. Ahead of its time, I think.
